articles.title: Mercury mystery: Poisonous element persists in tuna - BBC.com
articles.description: Pollution controls have seen mercury emissions plummet - but levels in tuna have remained stable.
articles.content:
By Matt McGrathEnvironment correspondent
Levels of mercury persist in tuna, decades after pollution controls were introduced to limit emissions, scientists say.
The poisonous element is released by… [+3375 chars]
